blog.name: pokemongoexcitement
blog.description: Just a blog about my adventures on Pokemon games. Pokemon Let's Go spoilers will be marked as Pokemon Let's Go Spoilers, Pokemon LGPE Spoilers, Pokemon Spoilers, and Spoilers. Pokemon Sword and Shield spoilers will be marked as Pokemon Sword and Shield, Pokemon Sword and Shield Spoilers, Pokemon Spoilers, and Spoilers.

tags: pokemon red blue green and yellow
summary: Of all the time I spent playing Pokemon, I only ever ran into two glitches. One was back when I was playing through Ultra Moon....
body:
Of all the time I spent playing Pokemon, I only ever ran into two glitches. One was back when I was playing through Ultra Moon.

The first time, though, I didn’t even realize it was a glitch until much later.

When I was a child playing Pokemon Red, I used to restart my game frequently, right around the time I was headed through Mount Moon. I have no idea why, but I found that portion of the game the most fun to do. I rarely got further than Brock, and only once or twice did I make it to Cerulean City. 

So when I eventually got ahold of Yellow, it was no surprise that I did the same there. For a while, nothing weird happened; not a big surprise, as most glitches in those games you really have to go out of your way to get. 

But one time, just after restarting the game, I turned to talk to Pikachu for the first time. I knew the script well enough to remember it was supposed to have its eyes closed with disdain.

You can imagine my surprise when a little lightning bolt appeared in a speech bubble over its head instead, and the little box which showed its face showed it using an electric attack. The screen even flickered.

I wasn’t sure what to make of it, at first. At first I thought it was a reference to the anime, and I’d missed it because, perhaps, I moved before speaking to Pikachu beforehand. But it didn’t happen next time I restarted the game, or the next, even when I talked to Pikachu before anything else.

For years I’d written this off as something I’d dreamed up and mistaken for reality, until I ended up coming across a video showing this exact animation. Apparently, it’s supposed to play when Pikachu learns Thunder or Thunderbolt, but I was lucky enough to get a glitch where it played earlier, and unintentionally resembled the anime.

So when I eventually got ahold of Yellow, it was no surprise that I did the same there. For a while, nothing weird happened; not a big surprise, as most glitches in those games you really have to go out of your way to get. 

But one time, just after restarting the game, I turned to talk to Pikachu for the first time. I knew the script well enough to remember it was supposed to have its eyes closed with disdain.

You can imagine my surprise when a little lightning bolt appeared in a speech bubble over its head instead, and the little box which showed its face showed it using an electric attack. The screen even flickered.

trail.content:
Of all the time I spent playing Pokemon, I only ever ran into two glitches. One was back when I was playing through Ultra Moon.

The first time, though, I didn’t even realize it was a glitch until much later.

When I was a child playing Pokemon Red, I used to restart my game frequently, right around the time I was headed through Mount Moon. I have no idea why, but I found that portion of the game the most fun to do. I rarely got further than Brock, and only once or twice did I make it to Cerulean City. 

So when I eventually got ahold of Yellow, it was no surprise that I did the same there. For a while, nothing weird happened; not a big surprise, as most glitches in those games you really have to go out of your way to get. 

But one time, just after restarting the game, I turned to talk to Pikachu for the first time. I knew the script well enough to remember it was supposed to have its eyes closed with disdain.

You can imagine my surprise when a little lightning bolt appeared in a speech bubble over its head instead, and the little box which showed its face showed it using an electric attack. The screen even flickered.

I wasn’t sure what to make of it, at first. At first I thought it was a reference to the anime, and I’d missed it because, perhaps, I moved before speaking to Pikachu beforehand. But it didn’t happen next time I restarted the game, or the next, even when I talked to Pikachu before anything else.

For years I’d written this off as something I’d dreamed up and mistaken for reality, until I ended up coming across a video showing this exact animation. Apparently, it’s supposed to play when Pikachu learns Thunder or Thunderbolt, but I was lucky enough to get a glitch where it played earlier, and unintentionally resembled the anime.

summary: From 9/24/18 to 9/27/18, the Pokémon marathon on TwitchPresents is LIVE this week with Master Quest! Episodes from season 5...
body:
From 9/24/18 to 9/27/18, the Pokémon marathon on TwitchPresents is LIVE this week with Master Quest!

Episodes from season 5 include the Whirl Cup, a baby Lugia, 3 epic gym battles, the gang meeting Eusine, a Phanpy egg, arriving at the Lake of Rage, Ash turning into a Pikachu, Misty’s Poliwhirl evolving, Ash reuniting with Lapras from the Orange Islands, the Larvitar arc, the Silver Conference and much more!

16 episodes per day (from Monday-Thursday) will rerun in multiple times just so you won’t miss the stream depending on your schedule.

Watching with Twitch chat could be the best (or worst) experience you’ll ever have! But if you want a more comfy chat experience, feel free to talk/chat about the marathon in my Pokémon Discord server PokéTōku —> Invite link here :)

blog.name: weirdandwackypokefusions
blog.title: Well that's strange!
blog.description:
Welcome!  I create, using the all-mighty classic Microsoft XP Paint, my own pokemon fusions. All the sprites come from pokestadium and usually people on deviantart/ the xy/sun&moon sprite project. I don't own any of the sprite used, I just fuse them! 
REQUESTS ARE OPEN! Ask Box: 3/15.
PLEASE FEEL FREE TO DRAW MY FUSIONS!!  I absolutely love it when people draw them! There's no need to ask either! Just make sure you tag me so them I can see it!
I hope you enjoy my fusions!

summary: Alolan Raicheon Alolan Raichu and Espeon fusion Psychic/Electric Type Ability: Static/Cheek Pouch Stats: HP - 75, Atk - 75, Def...
caption:
Alolan Raicheon

Alolan Raichu and Espeon fusion

Psychic/Electric Type

Ability: Static/Cheek Pouch

Stats: HP - 75, Atk - 75, Def - 65, SpA - 135, SpD - 105, Spe - 120

The Psychic Tailed Pokemon

Alolan Raicheon hops around and searches for delicious food.  It puts both of its feet on its two tails to levitate around but it can’t do it for too long. It uses its psychic abilities to detect the movement of its opponent and levitate out of danger on its tails.

Request for @neon-moonstone. I hope you like it! I decided to choose alolan raichu as I’ve never done a fusion with its alolan form before.

title: Excadrill - 530
body:
It can help in tunnel construction. Its drill has evolved into steel strong enough to bore through iron plates.

- Pokemon Black, X, Omega Ruby

blog.name: lgbt-pokemon
blog.title: all Pokemon are gay and trans
blog.description:
Requests are currently open! icon is our mascot, McMuffins, and he was drawn by @trriton! mods are Admin Pikachu, Mod Bulbasaur and Mod Mudkip.
☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆
This is an LGBT blog for Pokémon fans and Pokemonkin run by Pokémon fans! Send in headcanons, icon requests, stimboard requests, moodboard requests or requests for name + pronoun validation! Feel free to tag any post as kin/me/ID/etc unless specified otherwise!
